author: abehazbunjr
title: Tokenized Stake Tracking
description: Because staking offers no conversion tracking mechanism, SPOs have no visibility into the ROI of advertising or effective messaging.
solution: Users register stake with an on-page script that confirms stake, triggers ad tracking, reveals dynamic site content & activates airdrops.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
